Smart Oven: Create an oven that can adjust its temperature, cooking time, and cooking method based on the type of food being cooked. This oven will have sensors that detect the type of food being placed inside and use machine learning algorithms to determine the optimal cooking parameters. The oven will also have a built-in display that shows the cooking progress and recommended cooking time.

Multi-Functional Oven: Design an oven that can perform multiple functions, such as cooking, roasting, broiling, and toasting. The oven will have interchangeable cooking plates that can be easily swapped out, allowing users to switch between functions without having to clean the entire oven. The oven will also have a built-in timer and temperature control system for precise cooking.

Oven with Built-In Air Fryer: Create an oven that has a built-in air fryer feature. This feature will allow users to cook healthier versions of their favorite fried foods with little to no oil. The oven will have a detachable basket that can be used for air frying, and the temperature and cooking time will be adjustable.

Oven with Automatic Cooking Mode: Design an oven that can automatically detect the type of food being cooked and adjust the cooking time and temperature accordingly. The oven will have sensors that detect the food's moisture and fat content, and use this information to determine the optimal cooking parameters. The oven will also have a built-in display that shows the cooking progress and recommended cooking time.

Oven with Integrated Meal Planning System: Create an oven that has an integrated meal planning system. This system will allow users to input their dietary preferences and the number of people they are cooking for, and the oven will suggest recipes and cooking times based on these inputs. The oven will also have a built-in grocery list feature that allows users to purchase the necessary ingredients for the suggested recipes.
